column4: can anyone tell me how i need to set up my firewall to forward ports for deluge? im a complete noob.
i know my way around the block
oh ive already got one called "gfuw"
but i dont know how to go about fordarwding my ports
i use both a router and a software firewall
For GUI administration, try installing the Firestarter package.
i have a gui called gufw
where can i read about how to forward ports again?
do they have a linux version of that program at portforward.com?
Nope. It's more oriented towards setting up different routers to forward ports.
